subject: FROM FIRST BANK PLC  Attention.Beneficiary VIEW THE ATTACH IDENTIFICATION FOR REFERENCE
body:
FROM FIRST BANK PLC
Head Office Address.
Samuel Asabia House 35 Marina
P.O. Box 5216, Lagos, First Contact. Tel: +234-8033671343

 Attention.Beneficiary. We confirm having received the contact information sent to us by F.C.T. Police Command Headquarters Inspector Kayode Egbetokun The Inspector General of Police (IGP) for the payment of his compensation funds. Please note that the total amount of your funds with us for payment to you is $10.5 million dollars only.
Likewise, we have a strict obligation to ensure that your funds are credited to your account without delay. Please note that we have completed the necessary procedures to credit your funds to your account. We hereby recommend that you send us your banking information with your personal details to allow us to credit your funds to your account without delay and update our record. .I attach my official identification for reference, thank you
SincerelyMR MICHAEL PAULFIRST BANK PLC.

subject: Re: FROM FIRST BANK PLC  Attention.Beneficiary VIEW THE ATTACH IDENTIFICATION FOR REFERENCE
body:
Hello,

Thank you for reaching out to me from First Bank PLC. I appreciate your prompt response and the information provided. I understand that you have received a contact from Police Command Inspector Kayode Egbetokun regarding the payment of funds.

I would like to know more about the necessary procedures that need to be completed in order to credit the funds to my account. Could you please explain what steps are involved in this process? Additionally, it would be helpful if you could provide more details about the required personal and banking information that you mentioned.

I look forward to your response and further guidance on how we can proceed with the fund transfer.

Best wishes,
Akiko

subject: Re: FROM FIRST BANK PLC  Attention.Beneficiary VIEW THE ATTACH IDENTIFICATION FOR REFERENCE
body:
Hello,

Thank you for reaching out to me from First Bank PLC. I appreciate your prompt response and the information you have provided. I understand that you have received a contact from Police Command Inspector Kayode Egbetokun regarding the payment of funds.

I would like to confirm some details before proceeding further. Could you please provide more information about the necessary procedures that have been completed to credit my funds to my account? Additionally, what are the next steps I need to take in order to ensure a smooth transfer?

I am also curious about the official document you mentioned attaching for reference. Could you please provide more details about its contents and how it relates to my situation?

Thank you once again for your assistance. I look forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Akiko
